Sentencas: In this work, a 3D multi-physics coupled model was developed to analyze the temperature and thermal stress distribution in a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack, and then the effects of different flow channels (co-flow, counter-flow and cross-flow) and electrolyte thickness were investigated.
Titulo: Numerical Analysis of Thermal Stress for a Stack of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The simulation results indicate that the generated power is higher while the thermal stress is lower in the co-flow mode than those in the cross-flow mode.
Titulo: Numerical Analysis of Thermal Stress for a Stack of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In the cross-flow mode, a gas inlet and outlet arrangement is proposed to increase current density by about 10%.
Titulo: Numerical Analysis of Thermal Stress for a Stack of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The generated power of the stack increases with a thin electrolyte layer, but the temperature and its gradient of the stack also increase with increase of heat generation.
Titulo: Numerical Analysis of Thermal Stress for a Stack of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The thermal stress for two typical sealing materials is also studied.
Titulo: Numerical Analysis of Thermal Stress for a Stack of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The predicted results can be used for design and optimization of the stack structure to achieve lower stress and longer life.
Titulo: Numerical Analysis of Thermal Stress for a Stack of Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
